Title: The Age of the Earth
Writer: Castro Alves (poem), Glauber Rocha (screenplay), Glauber Rocha (story)
Actors: Maurício do Valle, Jece Valadão, Antonio Pitanga, Tarcísio Meira
Plot: The day that Pier Paolo Pasolini was killed, Glauber Rocha decided to make this film about the life of Christ in the Third World. Starting from a dialectical synthesis between capitalism ...
